h902.definition: probably of foreign origin; Bigvai, an Israelite; Bigvai.

h903.definition: of Persian derivation; Bigtha, a eunuch of Xerxes; Bigtha.

h904.definition: or בִּגְתָנָא; of similar derivation to {{h903}}; Bigthan or Bigthana, a eunuch of Xerxes; Bigthan, Bigthana.

h905.definition: from {{h909}}; properly, separation; by implication, a part of the body, branch of a tree, bar for carrying; figuratively, chief of a city; especially (with prepositional prefix) as an adverb, apart, only, besides; alone, apart, bar, besides, branch, by self, of each alike, except, only, part, staff, strength.

h906.definition: perhaps from {{h909}} (in the sense of divided fibres); flaxen thread or yarn; hence, a linen garment; linen.

h907.definition: from {{h908}}; a brag or lie; also a liar; liar, lie.

h908.definition: a primitive root; (figuratively) to invent; devise, feign.

h909.definition: a primitive root; to divide, i.e. (reflex.) be solitary; alone.

h910.definition: from {{h909}}; separate; adverb, separately; alone, desolate, only, solitary.

h911.definition: from {{h909}}; separation; Bedad, an Edomite; Bedad.

h912.definition: probably a shortened form {{h5662}}; servant of Jehovah; Bedejah, an Israelite; Bedeiah.

h913.definition: from {{h914}}; alloy (because removed by smelting); by analogy, tin; plummet, tin.

h914.definition: a primitive root; to divide (in variation senses literally or figuratively, separate, distinguish, differ, select, etc.); (make, put) difference, divide (asunder), (make) separate (self, -ation), sever (out), × utterly.

h916.definition: probably from {{h914}}; something in pieces, i.e. bdellium, a (fragrant) gum (perhaps amber); others a pearl; bdellium.

h917.definition: probably shortened for {{h5658}}; servile; Bedan, the name of two Israelites; Bedan.

h918.definition: a primitive root; to gap open; used only as a denominative from {{h919}}; to mend a breach; repair.

h919.definition: from {{h918}}; a gap or leak (in a building or a ship); breach,   calker.

h920.definition: probably from {{h1856}} with a prepositional prefix; by stabbing, i.e. assassin; Bidkar, an Israelite; Bidkar.

h921.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding (by transposition) to {{h6504}}; to scatter; scatter.

h922.definition: from an unused root (meaning to be empty); a vacuity, i.e. (superficially) an undistinguishable ruin; emptiness, void.

h923.definition: from an unused root (probably meaning to glisten); white marble or perhaps alabaster; red (marble).

h924.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h927}}; a hurry; only adverb, hastily; in haste.

h925.definition: from an unused root (meaning to be bright); shining; bright.

h926.definition: a primitive root; to tremble inwardly (or palpitate), i.e. (figuratively) be (causative, make) (suddenly) alarmed or agitated; by implication to hasten anxiously; be (make) affrighted (afraid, amazed, dismayed, rash), (be, get, make) haste(-n, -y, -ily), (give) speedy(-ily), thrust out, trouble, vex.

h927.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h926}}; to terrify, hasten; in haste, trouble.

h929.definition: from an unused root (probably meaning to be mute); properly, a dumb beast; especially any large quadruped or animal (often collective); beast, cattle.

h930.definition: in form a plural or {{h929}}, but really a singular of Egyptian derivation; a water-ox, i.e. the hippopotamus or Nile-horse; Behemoth.

h931.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to be thick; the thumb of the hand or great toe of the foot; thumb, great toe.

h932.definition: an orthographical variation of {{h931}}; thumb, Bohan, an Israelite; Bohan.

h933.definition: from an unused root meaning to be pale; white scurf; freckled spot.

h934.definition: feminine active participle of the same as {{h925}}; a whitish spot on the skin; bright spot.

h935.definition: a primitive root; to go or come (in a wide variety of applications); abide, apply, attain, × be, befall,   besiege, bring (forth, in, into, to pass), call, carry, × certainly, (cause, let, thing for) to come (against, in, out, upon, to pass), depart, × doubtless again,   eat,   employ, (cause to) enter (in, into, -tering, -trance, -try), be fallen, fetch,   follow, get, give, go (down, in, to war), grant,   have, × indeed, (in-) vade, lead, lift (up), mention, pull in, put, resort, run (down), send, set, × (well) stricken (in age), × surely, take (in), way.

h936.definition: a primitive root; to disrespect; contemn, despise, × utterly.

h938.definition: the same as {{h937}}; Buz, the name of a son of Nahor, and of an Israelite; Buz.

h939.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h936}}; something scorned; an object of contempt; despised.

h940.definition: patronymic from {{h938}}; a Buzite or descendant of Buz; Buzite.

h941.definition: the same as {{h940}}; Buzi, an Israelite; Buzi.

h942.definition: probably of Persian origin; Bavvai, an Israelite; Bavai.

h943.definition: a primitive root; to involve (literally or figuratively); be entangled, (perplexed).

h944.definition: for {{h2981}}; produce (of the earth, etc.); food, stock.

h945.definition: the same as {{h944}} (in the sense of rain); Bul, the eighth Hebrew month; Bul.

h946.definition: from {{h995}}; discretion; Bunah, an Israelite; Bunah.

h947.definition: a primitive root; to trample (literally or figuratively); loath, tread (down, under (foot)), be polluted.

h948.definition: from an unused root (of the same form) meaning to bleach, i.e. (intransitive) be white; probably cotton (of some sort); fine (white) linen.

h949.definition: from the same as {{h948}}; shining; Botsets, a rock near Michmash; Bozez.

h950.definition: feminine passive participle of an unused root (meaning to be hollow); emptiness (as adjective); empty.

h951.definition: properly, active participle from {{h1239}} as denominative from {{h1241}}; a cattle-tender; herdman.

h952.definition: a primitive root; to bore, i.e. (figuratively) examine; declare.

h953.definition: from {{h952}} (in the sense of {{h877}}); a pit hole (especially one used as a cistern or a prison); cistern, dungeon, fountain, pit, well.

h954.definition: a primitive root; properly, to pale, i.e. by implication to be ashamed; also (by implication) to be disappointed or delayed; (be, make, bring to, cause, put to, with, a-) shamed(-d), be (put to) confounded(-fusion), become dry, delay, be long.

h955.definition: feminine participle passive of {{h954}}; shame; shame.

h956.definition: (Aramaic) apparent denominative from {{h1005}}; to lodge over night; pass the night.

h958.definition: a primitive root; probably to cleave; spoil.

h959.definition: a primitive root; to disesteem; despise, disdain, contemn(-ptible),   think to scorn, vile person.

h962.definition: a primitive root; to plunder; catch, gather, (take) for a prey, rob(-ber), spoil, take (away, spoil), × utterly.

h964.definition: from {{h959}} and {{h3050}}; contempts of Jah; Bizjothjah, a place in Palestine; Bizjothjah.

h965.definition: from an unused root meaning to lighten; a flash of lightning; flash of lightning.

h966.definition: from {{h965}}; lightning; Bezek, a place in Palestine; Bezek.

h967.definition: a primitive root; to disperse; scatter.

h968.definition: of Persian origin; Biztha, a eunuch of Xerxes; Biztha.

h969.definition: from {{h974}}; an assayer or metals; tower.

h970.definition: or בָּחֻר; participle passive of {{h977}}; properly, selected, i.e. a youth (often collective); (choice) young (man), chosen, × hole.

h971.definition: another form of {{h975}}; a watch-tower of besiegers; tower.

h972.definition: from {{h977}}; select; choose, chosen one, elect.

h973.definition: a primitive root; to loath; abhor, get hastily (from the margin for {{h926}}).

h974.definition: a primitive root; to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively, to investigate; examine, prove, tempt, try (trial).

h975.definition: from {{h974}} (in the sense of keeping a look-out); a watch-tower; tower.

h977.definition: a primitive root; properly, to try, i.e. (by implication) select; acceptable, appoint, choose (choice), excellent, join, be rather, require.

h978.definition: patrial from {{h980}} (by transposition); a Bacharumite or inhabitant of Bachurim; Baharumite.

h979.definition: or בְּחוּרוֹת; feminine plural of {{h970}}; also (masculine plural) בְּחֻרִים; youth (collectively and abstractly); young men, youth.

h980.definition: or בַּחוּרִים; masculine plural of {{h970}}; young men; Bachurim, a place in Palestine; Bahurim.

h981.definition: or בָּטָה; a primitive root; to babble; hence, to vociferate angrily; pronounce, speak (unadvisedly).

h982.definition: a primitive root; properly, to hie for refuge (but not so precipitately as {{h2620}}); figuratively, to trust, be confident or sure; be bold (confident, secure, sure), careless (one, woman), put confidence, (make to) hope, (put, make to) trust.

h983.definition: from {{h982}}; properly, a place of refuge; abstract, safety, both the fact (security) and the feeling (trust); often (adverb with or without preposition) safely; assurance, boldly, (without) care(-less), confidence, hope, safe(-ly, -ty), secure, surely.

h984.definition: the same as {{h983}}; Betach, a place in Syria; Betah.

h988.definition: a primitive root; to desist from labor; cease.

h989.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h988}}; to stop; (cause, make to), cease, hinder.

h990.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to be hollow; the belly, especially the womb; also the bosom or body of anything; belly, body,   as they be born,   within, womb.

h991.definition: the same as {{h990}}; Beten. a place in Palestine; Beten.

h992.definition: from {{h990}}; (only in plural) a pistachio-nut (from its form); nut.

h993.definition: probably plural from {{h992}}; hollows; Betonim, a place in Palestine; Betonim.

h994.definition: perhaps from {{h1158}} (in the sense of asking); properly, a request; used only adverbially (always with 'my Lord'); oh that!; with leave, or if it please; alas, O, oh.

h995.definition: a primitive root; to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand; attend, consider, be cunning, diligently, direct, discern, eloquent, feel, inform, instruct, have intelligence, know, look well to, mark, perceive, be prudent, regard, (can) skill(-full), teach, think, (cause, make to, get, give, have) understand(-ing), view, (deal) wise(-ly, man).

h996.definition: (sometimes in the plural masculine or feminine); properly, the constructive form of an otherwise unused noun from {{h995}}; a distinction; but used only as a preposition,; between (repeated before each noun, often with other particles); also as a conjunction, either...or; among, asunder, at, between (-twixt...and), + from (the widest), × in, out of, whether (it be...or), within.

h998.definition: from {{h995}}; understanding; knowledge, meaning, × perfectly, understanding, wisdom.

h1000.definition: from the same as {{h948}}; an egg (from its whiteness); egg.
